name: The Wind & The Ladybird
description:
Controlled with arrow keys/WASD and mouse. Please be aware there are issues with audio playback if you are using the Firefox browser.

Made for the final round of GDKO 2022 - please play the original to compare if you are rating it!

A "better" remake of my Round 1 submission. All art and music made by me during this jam period, or kit-bashed from public domain assets.
